comment: Made the topics easy to understand and clearly cares about his students
Awesome professor! He brings his knowledge from the workforce into the class. Easy exams. Easy assignments. Very knowledgeable and makes the class interesting.

Professor Fields is an incredible professor that truly cares about and understands what he is teaching. He has no problems communicating with students outside of school hours to address questions or concerns. 
His lectures are worth listening to considering he has prior experiences. I also enjoyed the field trips we took during this course.

Mr. Fields was nothing less than amazing. Through his lecture videos he made you feel like you were in the classroom with him. He also, gave you a platform to respectfully respond to discussions based on things that are happening in real time. Highly recommend Mr. Fields to anybody that needs this class. Sits fill up fast.

I almost wanted to leave him a bad review, just so fewer people want to take his class because he's so popular it's almost impossible to get a class with him. His lectures are incredible and it's clear that he really is passionate about teaching. I learned a lot from his class, and as long as you show up and pay attention, I promise you'll be fine.

This professor is truly exceptional. He distinguishes his PowerPoint presentations to prevent them from resembling textbook readings and has effective communication. His incorporation of personal experiences enhances the relevance of the lessons. I wholeheartedly recommend this professor.

Professor Fields has been one of my favorite professor I have ever had in my college experience. He does a great job with his lectures, and makes them really easy to understand. If you have the opportunity to take one of his classes, I would definitely do so.

He is awesome. I've had him for 3 separate classes: corrections, Victimology and Profile of a Serial Offender. He is a great teacher. His lectures are detailed and up-to-date with current information and headlines. He makes class fun while learning and we have a lot of open debates in class. I HIGHLY recommend him. He's the best teacher at KSU.

One of the best professors! Did weekly discussions post, very easy. We had 3 exam and like 2 pop quiz, but he gives you a heads up. Such an easy class and exam are very easy, he also gives out study guides if you do to class! Honestly best teacher ever, so easy and actual enjoyable

350 characters is not enough to describe how amazing of a professor Mr. Fields is. He is so knowledgeable, kind, professional, and actually inspires students to want to stay in school. His presentations are the best and most entertaining. He always makes sure to engage students in real conversations and allows them to do projects instead of papers.

one of the best professors I've had at Kennesaw. Very comfortable and safe environment to be in. If you don't go to class you will not do well on the quizzes he uses specific questions and doesn't post lectures in class anywhere else. If you go to class regularly he will also send you a study guide that has all the answers for the exams.
overall professor field's corrections course is a very straightforward class. I encourage students to come to class regularly and participate.

Professor Fields is truly one of the best professors I have had at KSU. He is so passionate about what he teaches and the discussions in class are always something I would look forward to. There are a lot of bonus point opportunities so go to class! His attendance is not for a grade, but going to his lectures will help on test. 100% take his class!

This professor makes Corrections so fun! He makes the material interesting and we have lots of class discussion/ debates. He loves what he is teaching and is always happy, I always looked forward to going to class. His tests are easy if you go to class and there are minimal assignments.

Professor Fields was one of the best professors I've had at KSU. His lectures are always packed full of discussion. The only thing I would say is to go to class because he's always giving out bonus points.
I wish Professor Fields could be cloned. He is respectful, open to new ideas and opinions, enjoys what he teaches, and values participation and attendance.

comment: Do yourself a favor grab a seat in his class. His lectures are not boring; they are fun and engaging. You have to go to class because he does his own research and makes his slides (he does not give them out). Test (4) have questions based on power points and things he writes on board. There are weekly assign. and final project they r easy! TAKE HIM

I have had him back-to-back for two semesters, and he is one of my favorite professors. Every week there is a discussion post and lectures. It is important to attend class because he is lectured focused and gives out extra credit points occasionally for those that attend class.

Professor Fields is possibly one of the best professors I've had in my entire time at KSU, and I honestly wish it wasn't my last semester so that I could take him again. He is understanding, compassionate, and such a well-spoken and easy to understand teacher. If you have the chance to have him as a professor, you absolutely should.

Weekly assignments, only 2 tests aside from midterm and final exams which he gives great study guides for. Attendance is not mandatory, but essentially everything on tests and assignments is covered in class. Very friendly and will respond quickly to emails. Can't say enough good things about him would absolutely take again.

He is a wonderful professor. He does not require attendance but if you want to do well I recommend going to class. He personalizes his curriculum unlike others. He give bonus point throughout the semester by doing different activities but again you have to be in class. He is very caring and understanding if you talk to him

Great professor. Weekly discussion posts and quizzes. No exams. His lectures are very interesting because he talks about his experiences as a police officer and probation officer. Follow his instructions for the discussions and quizzes and you'll get an A. Super cool dude.
